name: HungerTale (MacSpain)
description:
A visual novel game in which the goal is to reach your family home before starving to death. To achieve this goal, you will be helped by foods that you can have interesting conversations with to make them more nutritious. Be careful, however, offended foods break down faster 

Controls: 

  • Arrows / WASD - switching options 
  • Space - selecting options

Authors:

Michał Kret - game & story design
Helena Chojnowska - lead art design
Tomasz Halemba - programming
Monika Struk - programming
Patryk Gałąska - programming
Anna Pytlewska - GUI art
